organisation_name: Advanced Mineral and Recycling Industrial Solutions P.C. (AdMiRIS)
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Commission operational expert group of the European Innovation Partnership on Raw Materials #E03392#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3392#Member#C
goals__remit: To offer smart solutions in minerals and recycling industry in the form of expert advice, cooperation, people sharing, common projects planning and execution and/or coinvesting
relevant_communication:
AdMiRIS is a startup company, founded by people coming from industry. 
So far: 
Participation in H2020 consortia, LIFE programs 
Consulting Greek groups like Epiros Cheese Producer, Motor Oil Hellas Petrichamicals 
Participation in EU events re. Raw Materials, EIT (KIC) Raw Materials
